content.help command: sends help message about a command

description:
Command to display the help message
Add an other command after it and it will return a specific help message

Command pings the bot
Returns the latency of the bot in ms

content.info: get info about the plex server (Don't call it to often)
content.info -a: get all info about the plex server (Don't call it to often)

description:
Returns an info message about the server.
With server status, content count and more
Returns a message about the libraries in the plex server.

content.summary: get a summary from recently added content

description: Returns an summary of latest added content per library

content.search: search the whole server for safe content
content.search -m/movie: search the whole server for movies
content.search -s/show: search the whole server for tv shows
content.Tip: if search is more than one word wrap in`" "`

description:
Searches the plex server for content with the give parameter
To search for more than one word wrap it in `" "`
You can add a filter with the flags

content.random: to get a random entry in plex

description:
Get a random piece of content from the plex server
To get a certain kind of content use the flags

Request the plex server admin for new content
Sends private message to te server admin

content.report: Report a problem with the server or bot

description:
Report a problem with the plex server or bot
Sends private message to te server admin
Sends an embed with developer support link
